Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Titan AI Fitness RPG PWA

A gamified, AI-driven fitness app combining elite coaching with RPG progression mechanics.

Features:
- Glassmorphic UI design with fitness-themed background
- Complete onboarding flow \(Goals, Experience, Commitment, Finalize\)
- Dashboard with character sheet, coach nudge, quick actions
- Training Log with exercise tracking and XP rewards
- Nutrition Log with macro tracking
- Progress Check-in with weight & photo tracking
- AI Coach Chat with personality-based responses
- Streak Calendar with milestones
- Comparison Engine with week-over-week analytics
- Quest Log with daily/weekly challenges
- Badge Gallery with rarity system
- Leaderboard with podium display
- Exercise Library with search & filters
- Monthly Review with grade system
- Weight Projection with goal setting
- XP Shop, Skill Tree, Team Hub
- Profile & Settings screens
- PWA support with offline caching
- localStorage persistence

Tech Stack: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
